channel.title: Travel✈️🗺️ on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Travel✈️🗺️ on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Rottnest Island
item.description: Trip to Rottnest Island - Visited on 29 Dec 2022 Best memories ever in my life! I appreciate and cherish every moment we had together❤️~ We laughed like a child, how happy haha 😆 Reached Fremantle Port Shed B at 9:30am, Ferry departed at 10:30am! Tickets were booked from Rottnest Express’s website. Isn’t that guy looks cool? 😎 Look! I caught the boat! haha jk It took around 30minutes to reach Rottnest Island.

item.title: Perth
item.description: Perth Trip (23 Dec 2022 - 09 Jan 2023) This is my first time ever to travel abroad and I’m travelling solo😝 Perth CBD - It’s only at the opposite of train station 😏 Seeing a black swan for the first time in my life, however it is not what i expected 🥲 so ugly HAHAHA Can’t touch the kangaroos cuz they’re wild life and are being protected What a funny face 🤔 He looks like wanna fight!
